title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - The dialog details have some issues:

i. Duplicate name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
The buttons should have an appropriate size.
When the dialog comes up, a table entry should be selected automatically.
When changing a parameter name to something long, the preview should accommodate the entire name.
The dialog should fit the screen properly, regardless of the number of parameters.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Try changing a parameter name to something very long.
3. Observe that the preview is cut off.
